plotaction.name: plot
plotaction.rule: A matrix/vector or 2 vectors/matrices of compatible size with an optional linespec

plotaction.description: Plots each series on the same plot
plotaction.name: Plot as multiple series
plotaction.rule: Multiple vectors

plotaction.ID: Plot as multiple series vs. first input
plotaction.action: @(varNames) plotpickerfunc('defaultdisplay','Plot as multiple series vs. first input',varNames)
plotaction.description: Plots the second and later series against the first series on the same plot
plotaction.labelfcn: @(varNames,varVals) plotpickerfunc('defaultlabel','plot as multiple series vs. first input',varNames,varVals)
plotaction.name: Plot as multiple series vs. first input
plotaction.rule: 3 or more vectors of the same size

plotaction.name: bar
plotaction.rule: A single matrix or a vector of X values and matrix of Y values of compatible size. Either choice with an optional scalar bar width

plotaction.name: area
plotaction.rule: A matrix or vector or 2 matrices or vectors of compatible size with an optional scalar base value

plotaction.name: pie
plotaction.rule: A vector or matrix with an optional vector or matrix of explosion parameters and optional cell array of labels

plotaction.name: hist
plotaction.rule: A vector or matrix with optional number of bins or monotonic vector bin centers

plotaction.name: contour
plotaction.rule: A matrix, 2 vectors and matrix, or 3 matrices of compatible size. Optionally add a scalar or vector of contour levels and a linespec.

plotaction.description: Display a matrix as a surface
plotaction.name: surf
plotaction.rule: 1 to 4 x,y,z, and color matrices of compatible size. Optionally replace X and Y matrices with vectors of compatible size

plotaction.name: mesh
plotaction.rule: 1 to 4 X,Y,Z, and color matrices of compatible size. Optionally replace X and Y matrices with vectors of compatible size

plotaction.name: plot
plotaction.rule: A matrix/vector or 2 vectors/matrices of compatible size with an optional linespec

plotaction.description: Plots each series on the same plot
plotaction.name: Plot as multiple series
plotaction.rule: Multiple vectors

plotaction.ID: Plot as multiple series vs. first input
plotaction.action: @(varNames) plotpickerfunc('defaultdisplay','Plot as multiple series vs. first input',varNames)
plotaction.description: Plots the second and later series against the first series on the same plot
plotaction.labelfcn: @(varNames,varVals) plotpickerfunc('defaultlabel','plot as multiple series vs. first input',varNames,varVals)
plotaction.name: Plot as multiple series vs. first input
plotaction.rule: 3 or more vectors of the same size

plotaction.description: Graphs with y tick labels on the left and right
plotaction.name: plotyy
plotaction.rule: 4 vectors all of the same length of x1,y1,x2,y2. Y values can also be matrices.

plotaction.name: semilogx
plotaction.rule: A vector/matrix or 2 vectors/matrices of compatible size with an optional linespec parameter

plotaction.name: semilogy
plotaction.rule: A vector/matrix or 2 vectors/matrices of compatible size with an optional linespec parameter

plotaction.name: loglog
plotaction.rule: A vector/matrix or 2 vectors/matrices of compatible size with an optional linespec parameter

plotaction.name: area
plotaction.rule: A matrix or vector or 2 matrices or vectors of compatible size with an optional scalar base value

plotaction.name: errorbar
plotaction.rule: 2 to 4 vectors or matrices all of the same size

plotaction.name: plot3
plotaction.rule: 3 vectors/matrices of compatible size with an optional linespec

plotaction.name: comet
plotaction.rule: 1 or 2 vectors of the same size with optional additional scalar tail length

plotaction.name: stem
plotaction.rule: A matrix/vector or 2 vectors/matrices of compatible size with optional 'fill' followed by an optional linespec

plotaction.name: stairs
plotaction.rule: A matrix/vector or 2 vectors/matrices of compatible size with an optional linespec

plotaction.name: stem3
plotaction.rule: 3 vectors or matrices of compatible size with optional 'fill' followed by an optional linespec

plotaction.name: bar
plotaction.rule: A single matrix or a vector of X values and matrix of Y values of compatible size. Either choice with an optional scalar bar width

plotaction.name: barh
plotaction.rule: A single matrix of Y values, or a vector of x values and matrix of Y values of compatible size, followed by an optional scalar bar width

plotaction.name: hist
plotaction.rule: A vector or matrix with optional number of bins or monotonic vector bin centers

plotaction.name: pareto
plotaction.rule: A vector of y values, with optional vector of x values or cell array of x labels of the same size

plotaction.name: plotmatrix
plotaction.rule: 1 or 2 matrices with the same number of rows, followed by an optional linespec

plotaction.name: scatter
plotaction.rule: A 2-column matrix or 2 vectors of the same, followed by an optional scalar or vector area parameter and optional scalar or vector colorspec

plotaction.name: scatter3
plotaction.rule: 3 vectors of the same, followed by an optional scalar or vector area parameter and optional scalar or vector colorspec

plotaction.name: spy
plotaction.rule: 1 vector or matrix followed by an optional linespec, followed by an optional scalar marker size

plotaction.name: plotmatrix
plotaction.rule: 1 or 2 matrices with the same number of rows, followed by an optional linespec

plotaction.name: pie
plotaction.rule: A vector or matrix with an optional vector or matrix of explosion parameters and optional cell array of labels

plotaction.name: pie3
plotaction.rule: A vector or matrix with an optional vector or matrix of explosion parameters and optional cell array of labels

plotaction.name: hist
plotaction.rule: A vector or matrix with optional number of bins or monotonic vector bin centers

plotaction.name: rose
plotaction.rule: An angle vector with optional number of bins or monotonic vector bin centers

plotaction.name: polar
plotaction.rule: A vector or matrix of angles with an optional vector or matrix of radii of the same size followed by an optional linepspec

plotaction.name: rose
plotaction.rule: An angle vector with optional number of bins or monotonic vector bin centers

plotaction.name: compass
plotaction.rule: Either a matrix or 2 vectors of compatible size followed by an optional linepsec

plotaction.name: contour
plotaction.rule: A matrix, 2 vectors and matrix, or 3 matrices of compatible size. Optionally add a scalar or vector of contour levels and a linespec.

plotaction.name: contourf
plotaction.rule: A matrix, 2 vectors and matrix, or 3 matrices of compatible size. Optionally add a scalar or vector of contour levels and a linespec

plotaction.name: contour3
plotaction.rule: A matrix, 2 vectors and matrix, or 3 matrices of compatible size. Optionally add a scalar or vector of contour levels and a linespec

plotaction.name: image
plotaction.rule: 1 RGB or indexed color array or 2 vectors and an RGB or indexed color array of compatible size

plotaction.description: Scale data and display as image
plotaction.name: imagesc
plotaction.rule: 1 RGB or indexed color array or 2 vectors and an RGB or indexed color array of compatible size

plotaction.name: pcolor
plotaction.rule: 1 RGB or indexed color array or 2 vectors and an RGB or indexed color array of compatible size

plotaction.description: Display a matrix as a surface
plotaction.name: surf
plotaction.rule: 1 to 4 x,y,z, and color matrices of compatible size. Optionally replace X and Y matrices with vectors of compatible size

plotaction.name: surfc
plotaction.rule: 1 to 4 X,Y,Z, and color matrices of compatible size. Optionally replace X and Y matrices with vectors of compatible size

plotaction.name: surfl
plotaction.rule: A Z matrix, or X,Y,Z matrices followed by an optional light source direction vector. Optionally replace X and Y matrices with vectors of compatible size

plotaction.name: mesh
plotaction.rule: 1 to 4 X,Y,Z, and color matrices of compatible size. Optionally replace X and Y matrices with vectors of compatible size

plotaction.name: meshc
plotaction.rule: 1 to 4 X,Y,Z, and color matrices of compatible size. Optionally replace X and Y matrices with vectors of compatible size

plotaction.name: meshz
plotaction.rule: 1 to 4 X,Y,Z, and color matrices of compatible size. Optionally replace X and Y matrices with vectors of compatible size

plotaction.name: waterfall
plotaction.rule: Waterfall plot

plotaction.name: ribbon
plotaction.rule: A Y matrix or X,Y matrices or vectors of the same size followed by an optional scalar width parameter

plotaction.name: contour3
plotaction.rule: A matrix, 2 vectors and matrix, or 3 matrices of compatible size. Optionally add a scalar or vector of contour levels and a linespec

plotaction.name: slice
plotaction.rule: A 3 dimensional volume array with 3 vectors defining slice planes

plotaction.name: feather
plotaction.rule: A numeric array or 2 numeric arrays of the same size followed by an optional linespec

plotaction.name: compass
plotaction.rule: Either a matrix or 2 vectors of compatible size followed by an optional linepsec

plotaction.name: quiver
plotaction.rule: 2 or 4 numeric arrays of the same size followed by an optional scalar scale and an optional linespec

plotaction.name: quiver3
plotaction.rule: 4 numeric arrays of the same size followed by an optional scalar scale and an optional linespec

plotaction.name: streamslice
plotaction.rule: Either 2 or 4 3-dimensional arrays of the same size followed by an optional scalar scale and an optional linespec

plotaction.name: streamline
plotaction.rule: A cell array of double arrays produced by stream2 or stream3

plotaction.name: ezplot
plotaction.rule: A function handle followed by an optional vector defining a range of x and optionally y values

plotaction.description: Easy to use 3-d parametric curve plotter
plotaction.name: ezplot3
plotaction.rule: 3 parametric function handles followed by an optional domain range vector

plotaction.description: Easy to use polar coordinate plotter
plotaction.name: ezpolar
plotaction.rule: A function handle followed by a optional vector range of theta values

plotaction.name: ezcontour
plotaction.rule: A 2-input function handle followed by an optional integer grid size parameter or a 2 or 4 element domain vector

plotaction.description: Easy to use filled contour plotter
plotaction.name: ezcontourf
plotaction.rule: A 2-input function handle followed by an optional integer grid size parameter or a 2 or 4 element domain vector

plotaction.description: Easy to use 3-D colored surface plotter
plotaction.name: ezsurf
plotaction.rule: A 2-input function handle followed by an optional integer grid size parameter or a 2 or 4 element domain vector

plotaction.description: Easy to use combination surf/contour plotter
plotaction.name: ezsurfc
plotaction.rule: A 2-input function handle followed by an optional integer grid size parameter or a 2 or 4 element domain vector

plotaction.name: ezmesh
plotaction.rule: A 2-input function handle followed by an optional integer grid size parameter or a 2 or 4 element domain vector

plotaction.description: Easy to use combination mesh/contour plotter
plotaction.name: ezmeshc
plotaction.rule: A 2-input function handle followed by an optional integer grid size parameter or a 2 or 4 element domain vector

plotaction.name: bodeplot
plotaction.rule: A list of one or more LTI objects with an optional frequency vector or cell array containing a frequency range

plotaction.name: nicholsplot
plotaction.rule: A list of one or more LTI objects with an optional frequency vector or cell array containing a frequency range

plotaction.name: nyquistplot
plotaction.rule: A list of one or more LTI objects with an optional frequency vector or cell array containing a frequency range

plotaction.name: sigmaplot
plotaction.rule: A list of one or more LTI objects with an optional frequency vector or cell array containing a frequency range

plotaction.name: rlocusplot
plotaction.rule: A list of one or more LTI objects with optional vector or scalar gains

plotaction.name: pzplot
plotaction.rule: A list of one or more LTI objects

plotaction.description: Pole-zero map plot for I/O pairs
plotaction.name: iopzplot
plotaction.rule: A list of one or more LTI objects

plotaction.description: Step response plot of LTI systems
plotaction.name: stepplot
plotaction.rule: A list of one or more LTI objects with optional vector or scalar time value(s)

plotaction.name: impulseplot
plotaction.rule: A list of one or more LTI objects with optional vector or scalar time value(s)

plotaction.name: hsvplot
plotaction.rule: An LTI object

plotaction.name: fdtfvtool
plotaction.rule: One or more of most multi-rate and adaptive filter objects inheriting from: adaptfilt.apru,adaptfilt.bap,aadaptfilt.adaptfilt,adaptfilt.adaptdffir,mfilt.abstractfirmultirate,mfilt.abstractcic.

plotaction.name: fdtfvtoolmag
plotaction.rule: One or more of most multi-rate and adaptive filter objects inheriting from: adaptfilt.apru,adaptfilt.bap,aadaptfilt.adaptfilt,adaptfilt.adaptdffir,mfilt.abstractfirmultirate,mfilt.abstractcic.

plotaction.name: fdtfvtoolphase
plotaction.rule: One or more of most multi-rate and adaptive filter objects inheriting from: adaptfilt.apru,adaptfilt.bap,aadaptfilt.adaptfilt,adaptfilt.adaptdffir,mfilt.abstractfirmultirate,mfilt.abstractcic.

plotaction.name: fdtfvtoolmagphase
plotaction.rule: One or more of most multi-rate and adaptive filter objects inheriting from: adaptfilt.apru,adaptfilt.bap,aadaptfilt.adaptfilt,adaptfilt.adaptdffir,mfilt.abstractfirmultirate,mfilt.abstractcic.

plotaction.name: fdtfvtoolgrpdelay
plotaction.rule: One or more of most multi-rate and adaptive filter objects inheriting from: adaptfilt.apru,adaptfilt.bap,aadaptfilt.adaptfilt,adaptfilt.adaptdffir,mfilt.abstractfirmultirate,mfilt.abstractcic.

plotaction.name: fdtfvtoolphdelay
plotaction.rule: One or more of most multi-rate and adaptive filter objects inheriting from: adaptfilt.apru,adaptfilt.bap,aadaptfilt.adaptfilt,adaptfilt.adaptdffir,mfilt.abstractfirmultirate,mfilt.abstractcic.

plotaction.name: fdtfvtoolimpulse
plotaction.rule: One or more of most multi-rate and adaptive filter objects inheriting from: adaptfilt.apru,adaptfilt.bap,aadaptfilt.adaptfilt,adaptfilt.adaptdffir,mfilt.abstractfirmultirate,mfilt.abstractcic.

plotaction.name: fdtfvtoolstep
plotaction.rule: One or more of most multi-rate and adaptive filter objects inheriting from: adaptfilt.apru,adaptfilt.bap,aadaptfilt.adaptfilt,adaptfilt.adaptdffir,mfilt.abstractfirmultirate,mfilt.abstractcic.

plotaction.name: fdtfvtoolpolezero
plotaction.rule: One or more of most multi-rate and adaptive filter objects inheriting from: adaptfilt.apru,adaptfilt.bap,aadaptfilt.adaptfilt,adaptfilt.adaptdffir,mfilt.abstractfirmultirate,mfilt.abstractcic.

plotaction.name: fdtfvtoolfiltcoef
plotaction.rule: One or more of most multi-rate and adaptive filter objects inheriting from: adaptfilt.apru,adaptfilt.bap,aadaptfilt.adaptfilt,adaptfilt.adaptdffir,mfilt.abstractfirmultirate,mfilt.abstractcic.

plotaction.name: fdtfvtoolfiltinfo
plotaction.rule: One or more of most multi-rate and adaptive filter objects inheriting from: adaptfilt.apru,adaptfilt.bap,aadaptfilt.adaptfilt,adaptfilt.adaptdffir,mfilt.abstractfirmultirate,mfilt.abstractcic.

plotaction.description: fvtool estimate fixed-point filter frequency response through filtering
plotaction.name: fdtfvtoolmagestimate
plotaction.rule: DFILT filter objects excluding adaptive or multi-rate filters (ADAPTFILT or MFILT objects).

plotaction.description: fvtool estimate of round-off noise power spectral density of filter output
plotaction.name: fdtfvtoolnoisepower
plotaction.rule: DFILT filter objects excluding adaptive or multi-rate filters (ADAPTFILT or MFILT objects).

plotaction.name: fdtzerophase
plotaction.rule: One or more adaptive filter (adaptfilt) or multi-rate filter (mfilt) objects.

plotaction.name: polyphase
plotaction.rule: A multi-rate filter object .

plotaction.name: fvtool
plotaction.rule: Either one or more dfilt objects or one or more numerator-denominator pairs.

plotaction.name: fvtoolmag
plotaction.rule: Either one or more dfilt objects or one or more numerator-denominator pairs.

plotaction.name: fvtoolphase
plotaction.rule: Either one or more dfilt objects or one or more numerator-denominator pairs.

plotaction.name: fvtoolmagphase
plotaction.rule: Either one or more dfilt objects or one or more numerator-denominator pairs.

plotaction.name: fvtoolgrpdelay
plotaction.rule: Either one or more dfilt objects or one or more numerator-denominator pairs.

plotaction.name: fvtoolphdelay
plotaction.rule: Either one or more dfilt objects or one or more numerator-denominator pairs.

plotaction.name: fvtoolimpulse
plotaction.rule: Either one or more dfilt objects or one or more numerator-denominator pairs.

plotaction.name: fvtoolstep
plotaction.rule: Either one or more dfilt objects or one or more numerator-denominator pairs.

plotaction.name: fvtoolpolezero
plotaction.rule: Either one or more dfilt objects or one or more numerator-denominator pairs.

plotaction.name: fvtoolfiltcoef
plotaction.rule: Either one or more dfilt objects or one or more numerator-denominator pairs.

plotaction.name: fvtoolfiltinfo
plotaction.rule: Either one or more dfilt objects or one or more numerator-denominator pairs

plotaction.name: freqs
plotaction.rule: A pair of numerator-denominator vectors followed by either: i.) a frequency vector with 2 or more entries; or ii.) a real scalar value indicating the number of frequency points.

plotaction.name: impz
plotaction.rule: A pair of numerator-denominator vectors. Optionally add a scalar or vector of integers and a positive scalar.

plotaction.name: stepz
plotaction.rule: A pair of numerator-denominator vectors. Optionally add a scalar or vector of integers and a positive scalar.

plotaction.name: freqz
plotaction.rule: A pair of numerator-denominator vectors. Optionally add a scalar or vector of integers and a positive scalar.

plotaction.name: grpdelay
plotaction.rule: A pair of numerator-denominator vectors. Optionally add a real scalar or vector and a positive scalar.

plotaction.name: phasedelay
plotaction.rule: A pair of numerator-denominator vectors. Optionally add a real scalar or vector and a positive scalar.

plotaction.name: phasez
plotaction.rule: A pair of numerator-denominator vectors. Optionally add a real scalar or vector and a positive scalar.

plotaction.name: zerophase
plotaction.rule: A pair of numerator-denominator vectors. Optionally add real scalar or vector.

plotaction.name: zplane
plotaction.rule: A pair row vectors or column vectors or a dfilt object.

plotaction.name: wvtool
plotaction.rule: Either a sigwin object or one or more windows vectors specified using winname.

plotaction.name: cpsd
plotaction.rule: A pair of vectors of the same length. Optionally add a scalar or numeric vector and a positive integer.

plotaction.name: mscohere
plotaction.rule: A pair of vectors of the same length. Optionally add a scalar or numeric vector and a positive integer.

plotaction.name: pburg
plotaction.rule: A numeric vector with an optional scalar integer order.

plotaction.name: pcov
plotaction.rule: A numeric vector with an optional scalar integer order.

plotaction.name: peig
plotaction.rule: A numeric vector with an optional scalar integer number of sinusoids.

plotaction.name: periodogram_psd
plotaction.rule: A single numeric vector.

plotaction.description: Mean-squared spectrum estimate using periodogram method
plotaction.name: periodogram_msp
plotaction.rule: A single numeric vector.

plotaction.name: pmcov
plotaction.rule: A numeric vector with an optional scalar integer order.

plotaction.name: pmtm
plotaction.rule: A numeric vector with an optional scalar time-bandwidth product.

plotaction.name: pmusic
plotaction.rule: A numeric vector with an optional scalar integer number of sinusoids.

plotaction.name: pwelch_psd
plotaction.rule: A single numeric vector.

plotaction.name: pwelch_msp
plotaction.rule: A single numeric vector.

plotaction.name: pyulear
plotaction.rule: A numeric vector with an optional scalar integer order.

plotaction.name: spectrogram
plotaction.rule: A numeric vector. Optionally add in order: i.) a numeric vector or integer>1 ii.) a positive integer iii.) a numeric vector or integer.

plotaction.name: tfestimate
plotaction.rule: A pair of numeric vectors of the same length. Optionally add in order: i.) a numeric vector or integer>1 ii.) 1 or 2 positive integers iii.) a numeric scalar.

plotaction.name: strips
plotaction.rule: A numeric vector or matrix. Optionally add either a positive integer or between 2 and 3 positive scalars.
